about_the_game:
Join over +100k followers and enter the world of Dark Island: Faded Memories. This RPG takes you back in time with retro and dark fantasy feel. Explore the mysterious and depressed island, uncover its secrets and enjoy the adventure.

  • Step into Dark Fantasy: Explore a macabre, depressive island filled with haunting mysteries.

  • Become the strongest: Fight powerful bosses and defeat dangerous enemies.

  • Create your build: Choose from many armors and weapons to match your style.

  • Experience retro graphics reimagined: Classic Game Art enhanced with modern effects.


    Follow the game on TikTok and YouTube to watch its development daily. 

    This page is under construction, new images and descriptions will be added soon!
